name: Flexibility
description: Flexibility exercises to improve range of motion and prevent injuries.

workout_groups.name: Beginner Flexibility Routine
workout_groups.description: Basic stretches and mobility work to improve flexibility and prevent stiffness.

workouts.name: Standing Forward Fold
workouts.description: Bend at the hips and reach toward your toes while keeping your legs straight.

workouts.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
workouts.description: Move between arching and rounding your back to increase spinal flexibility.

workouts.name: Seated Butterfly Stretch
workouts.description: Sit with the soles of your feet together and gently press your knees toward the floor.

workouts.name: Wall Shoulder Stretch
workouts.description: Place your hand against a wall and slowly turn away to stretch the chest and shoulder.

workouts.name: Hip Flexor Stretch
workouts.description: Step one foot forward into a lunge and gently push your hips forward.

workouts.name: Neck Stretch
workouts.description: Gently tilt your head to one side, bringing your ear toward your shoulder.

workout_groups.name: Intermediate Flexibility Routine
workout_groups.description: Moderate stretches and mobility work to enhance flexibility and range of motion.

workouts.name: Pigeon Pose
workouts.description: Bring one leg forward and extend the other leg back to stretch the hips and glutes.

workouts.name: Cobra Stretch
workouts.description: Lie on your stomach and push up with your hands to stretch the front of your body.

workouts.name: Lateral Side Bend
workouts.description: Stand tall and reach one arm overhead while bending to the opposite side.

workouts.name: Hamstring Stretch with Strap
workouts.description: Use a strap or towel to pull one leg toward you while keeping it straight.

workouts.name: Child's Pose with Side Stretch
workouts.description: In Child's Pose, reach one arm out to the side to stretch the lats and shoulders.

workouts.name: Standing Quad Stretch
workouts.description: Stand on one leg and pull the opposite foot toward your glutes to stretch the quads.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Flexibility & Strength Routine
workout_groups.description: Combining static and active flexibility to improve mobility and muscular control.

workouts.name: Standing Leg Hold
workouts.description: Lift one leg in front of you and hold it as high as possible while maintaining balance.

workouts.name: Bridge Hold
workouts.description: Lift your hips off the ground and hold a strong bridge position.

workouts.name: Seated Forward Fold with Weight
workouts.description: Hold a light weight while folding forward to increase hamstring flexibility.

workouts.name: Deep Cossack Squats
workouts.description: Shift your weight from side to side in a deep lateral squat.

workouts.name: Thoracic Spine Twists
workouts.description: Sit in a deep squat and rotate your torso, opening the chest toward the ceiling.

workouts.name: Loaded Shoulder Stretch
workouts.description: Hold a resistance band or weight overhead while slowly stretching the shoulders.

workout_groups.name: Elite Flexibility Routine
workout_groups.description: Advanced flexibility training to achieve extreme ranges of motion and control.

workouts.name: Full Split Hold
workouts.description: Achieve a full split and hold the position to increase flexibility.

workouts.name: Backbend with Leg Extension
workouts.description: Perform a deep backbend while extending one leg for added difficulty.

workouts.name: Overhead Squat Hold
workouts.description: Hold a squat position with arms extended overhead to improve hip and shoulder flexibility.

workouts.name: Cossack Squat with Reach
workouts.description: Perform a deep lateral squat while reaching toward the floor for added stretch.

workouts.name: Weighted Forward Fold
workouts.description: Hold a weight while folding forward to increase hamstring flexibility.

workout_groups.name: Super Flexibility Routine
workout_groups.description: Elite-level flexibility training designed for maximum mobility, strength, and control.

workouts.name: Pancake Stretch with Weighted Reach
workouts.description: Sit with legs wide apart and use a weight to deepen the forward fold.

workouts.name: Hanging Splits
workouts.description: Support yourself on a bar and slowly lower into a split.

workouts.name: Standing Needle Hold
workouts.description: Lift one leg overhead while standing, requiring extreme balance and flexibility.

workouts.name: Extreme Backbend Hold
workouts.description: Perform a deep backbend and hold the position with control.

workouts.name: Planche with Shoulder Stretch
workouts.description: Hold a planche position while engaging a deep shoulder stretch.

workouts.name: Overhead Weighted Pike Stretch
workouts.description: Hold a weight overhead while bending into a deep pike stretch, requiring hamstring and shoulder mobility.
